channel.title: Coding help
channel.description:
Hello all, My friend told me that he can make a client with 35 items in the inventory, he showed me, i did it and now, my items are going off the page, because i made it be able to hold 65 items, instead of 28 He also told me that he can make his own class ( like class1.java) to make the items smaller, allthough, he is charging a fee, i cant afford it, and i was wondering if anyone has it, could/will make it for me, or knows someone who could, please respond, Thanks
~Mayhem

item.title: Coding help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Hahaha, Mayhem, how did you know it was me though?

@zyle - He might not know how to add a scroll bar to something yet, ive been working with clients just as long as my server and i still cant rofl. /feelingstupid

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

SOme friend if he’s charging a fee to copy and paste. YOu can either make the item’s “field” smaller, and make the item icon smaller as well, or like Coon said, add a scroll bar to the inventory interface. But why on earth would you want 65 items at once? Might as well just copy the player’s entire bank contents to their inventory.

And it would be a very large inventory, 13x5 grid.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Mayhem Mopar Mayhem
item.description:
@Mopar_Mayhem wrote:

wait wait wait wait wait Kenshin?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 06:34:13 pm[/size][hr]i play kenshinscape, remember “Boom”???

Read full topic

item.title: Coding help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The easiest way would be to add a scroll bar to the inventory. Also, mind releasing that edit you did to me and ill see if i can help fix that issue?

Read full topic
